text: The Brooklyn Indians were an American basketball team based in Brooklyn, New York that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team was previously known as the Camden Indians. The team moved to Brooklyn during the 1942/43 season on January 18, 1943. The team dropped out during the 1st half of the 1943/44 season. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. title: Brooklyn Indians
